Container:
Pre-Seederr ghcr.io/uloga1/pre-seederr:latest https://github.com/Uloga1/pre-seederr/pkgs/container/pre-seederr bridge
sh false https://github.com/Uloga1/pre-seederr/issues https://github.com/Uloga1/pre-seederr
Pre-Seederr is a lightweight, stateless automation tool designed for cross-seeding. You upload a Tracker A .torrent file, and it automatically searches Prowlarr for a matching release on Tracker B. With a single click, it injects both the downloading file and the paused pre-seed directly into qBittorrent, complete with custom tags and category routing.
Downloaders: Tools: http://[IP]:[PORT:5000] https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Uloga1/pre-seederr/latest/unraid/pre-seederr.xml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Uloga1/pre-seederr/latest/logo.png
Automated cross-seeding and injection tool bridging Prowlarr and qBittorrent.
bridge
5000 5000 tcp
/mnt/user/appdata/pre-seederr /app/data rw
<Config Name
